controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to S3 resources based on applicable access control policies

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies, bucket policies, and ACLs through CloudFormation or Terraform templates to enforce least privilege access

controls.title: Cryptographic Protection
controls.description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of data stored in S3

implementation.description: Enable S3 default encryption using AWS KMS or SSE-S3, configure encryption in transit via HTTPS-only bucket policies

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Determine and configure auditable events for S3 operations

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail for S3 API calls, configure S3 server access logging, and enable AWS Config for compliance monitoring

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Conduct backups of S3 data and ensure backup integrity

implementation.description: Configure S3 Cross-Region Replication (CRR) and versioning through infrastructure templates

controls.title: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege for S3 access permissions

implementation.description: Regularly review and audit IAM policies and S3 bucket permissions to ensure minimal necessary access

controls.title: Baseline Requirements
controls.description: Establish security baselines for S3 service configuration

implementation.description: Create standardized S3 bucket templates with security controls including encryption, versioning, and access logging

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Classify data stored in S3 buckets according to sensitivity levels

implementation.description: Implement S3 object tagging strategy to classify data and apply appropriate security controls based on classification

controls.title: Encryption Key Management
controls.description: Securely manage encryption keys used for S3 data protection

implementation.description: Use AWS KMS for key management with appropriate key rotation policies and access controls

controls.title: Data Backup and Recovery
controls.description: Implement backup and recovery procedures for S3 data

implementation.description: Configure automated backup strategies using S3 versioning, MFA delete, and cross-region replication

controls.title: Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Manage vulnerabilities in S3 service configuration and access patterns

implementation.description: Use AWS Security Hub and AWS Config Rules to continuously monitor S3 configurations for security vulnerabilities

controls.title: S3 Block Public Access
controls.description: S3 Block Public Access setting should be enabled at the account and bucket level

implementation.description: Configure S3 Block Public Access settings in CloudFormation templates and apply at both account and bucket levels

controls.title: S3 Bucket Public Read
controls.description: S3 buckets should not allow public read access

implementation.description: Monitor bucket policies and ACLs using AWS Config Rules to prevent public read access

controls.title: S3 Bucket Public Write
controls.description: S3 buckets should not allow public write access

implementation.description: Use AWS Config Rules to monitor and alert on buckets with public write permissions

controls.title: S3 Server Side Encryption
controls.description: S3 buckets should have server-side encryption configured

implementation.description: Configure default bucket encryption using AWS KMS or AES-256 in infrastructure templates

controls.title: S3 SSL Requests Only
controls.description: S3 buckets should require requests to use SSL

implementation.description: Implement bucket policies that deny all non-SSL requests using aws:SecureTransport condition

controls.title: S3 MFA Delete
controls.description: S3 buckets should have MFA delete enabled for versioned buckets

implementation.description: Enable MFA delete on S3 buckets containing sensitive data through AWS CLI or SDK with root account credentials

controls.title: S3 Server Access Logging
controls.description: S3 bucket server access logging should be enabled

implementation.description: Configure S3 server access logging in CloudFormation templates with dedicated logging bucket

controls.title: S3 Versioning
controls.description: S3 buckets with versioning enabled should have lifecycle policies configured

implementation.description: Define lifecycle policies in infrastructure templates to manage version retention and transition to lower-cost storage classes

controls.title: S3 Event Notifications
controls.description: S3 buckets should have event notifications configured for security monitoring

implementation.description: Configure S3 event notifications to trigger Lambda functions or SNS topics for security event processing

controls.title: S3 Cross-Region Replication
controls.description: S3 buckets should have cross-region replication configured for disaster recovery

implementation.description: Configure cross-region replication rules in CloudFormation templates with appropriate IAM roles

cost.name: AWS S3 Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Storage Class Optimization
controls.description: Use appropriate S3 storage classes based on access patterns to minimize storage costs

implementation.description: Configure S3 Intelligent Tiering and lifecycle policies to automatically transition objects to cost-effective storage classes

controls.title: Lifecycle Policy Management
controls.description: Implement lifecycle policies to automatically delete or archive old data

implementation.description: Define lifecycle rules in CloudFormation templates to transition objects through storage classes and expire unnecessary data

controls.title: Incomplete Multipart Upload Cleanup
controls.description: Clean up incomplete multipart uploads to avoid unnecessary storage charges

implementation.description: Configure lifecycle policies to automatically abort incomplete multipart uploads after a specified number of days

controls.title: Data Transfer Optimization
controls.description: Optimize data transfer costs by using CloudFront and VPC endpoints

implementation.description: Deploy CloudFront distributions for frequently accessed content and VPC endpoints for internal AWS service communication

controls.title: Request Cost Optimization
controls.description: Minimize request costs by optimizing application access patterns

implementation.description: Implement efficient data retrieval patterns, use S3 Select for partial data retrieval, and batch operations where possible

controls.title: Storage Analytics and Monitoring
controls.description: Use S3 Storage Lens and analytics to monitor and optimize storage usage

implementation.description: Enable S3 Storage Lens organization-wide to gain visibility into storage usage patterns and cost optimization opportunities

controls.title: Reserved Capacity Planning
controls.description: Consider S3 One Zone-IA or Glacier for predictable, long-term storage needs

implementation.description: Analyze storage patterns using S3 analytics and migrate appropriate data to lower-cost storage classes based on access frequency
